abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Romaine Sweat pay rent in Beacon, NY.
lead_paragraph: Romaine Sweat may be struggling to raise four children on his own, but he swells with happiness when he talks about their accomplishments.
